name: CHOO CHOO
description:
DEV BUILD - WINDOWS ONLY

--------------------

CHOO CHOO is a cooperative railworker simulator with a twist : Both players wear colored glasses, and see different things on the screen !

Work together to send each train to its destination !
Communication is key !!

--------------------

SETUP

Requires two controllers

One player wears red glasses, the other wears cyan glasses, so that each of them can only see one color.

--------------------

HOW TO PLAY

Left stick to move,  A to flip a switch

Work with your teammate to send each train to the city with the same icon !
developers: h i l o q o
